Summary: during early 50's army closed road for several days--big dig sight seen--no explanation
trends: There has been one other sighting in Bowie
There were no other sightings in Bowie on or around November 30th 1952
divs: Sighting Detailssometime in the early to mid 50's something occured on laurel-bowie road (maryland route 197) that cause the military to close the road for several days. when reopened--while driving in the vicinity--a large excavation and refill was very noticable behind a chain link fence on the us govt fish and wildlife property--to this day--no trees grow there--lights were seen the night before and no explanation other than govt business was forthcoming. i was just a kid then--but every time i ride by and see the vacant area--i wonder
